short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the top 10 most frequently used words on the page. Developed by Oleg Uskov from Simtech Development: https://simtechdev.com/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Word Frequency Analyzer is a simple and convenient extension for analyzing text on web pages. It displays the top 10 most frequently used words, their counts, and percentage ratios. The extension filters out stop words (such as articles and prepositions) and words shorter than three characters, providing a more accurate representation of the text's content. The word list is presented in a tabular format, with an option to copy the data for easy pasting into text editors like Google Sheets or Notepad. Suitable for use with multiple languages.
